name: Samurai Hiccup
description:
You are a bird samurai who has drunk too much at the bar, giving you hiccups that make you jump. Very nice :)  It's really short but I hope like it! It's a game for the GMTK game jam just so you know and it takes 2 minutes to play!!! Okay GOOD LUCK!

Controls:

Left and Right Arrow Keys - Move

Space Bar - Attack
